attributes.action: Allow the Police to now have the right to strike
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the Police now must work as any other citizen of this Country, having no more or any less rights than anyone else. Then they should have the same rights as any other citizen of this country and that includes the Right to strike. It can not be right that they do not have the right to strike when a proper legal process has been followed and an agreement reached which is then changed by one side.
